message: Bob, I'm feeling generous. Take it or leave it!
Alice, let's be fair. I'll take 90% and you can have the remaining 10%.
Bob, that's my final offer -  a chance for you to get a decent amount!
Alice, I think this is a fair split. We both get a good portion of the money.
Bob, time is running out! Let's be reasonable and split the difference.
Alice, let's split the difference this time. I think we can both be happy with this deal.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take a little less and let's end this!
